item.title: "Has logged in" message
item.dc:creator: @aznboi594 aznboi594
item.description:
@aznboi594 wrote:

Search for:

sM("Welcome To SageScape.");

or if you changed it replace sagescape with ur servername

You should see something like this:

if (playerRights == 0); sM("Welcome To SageScape.");

Above:

if (playerRights == 0);

Place this code:

[code]if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“DemonicDusty”))
{
talk("The Best Hoster, Owner, & Coder " +playerName+ " just logged in! ");
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“DemonicDusty”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“DemonicDusty”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“DemonicDusty”))
{
talk(“The Best Hoster, Owner, & Coder " +playerName+ " just logged in!”);
}
else if (playerRights == 3)
{
talk(“Co-Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in!”);
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“jrfighter3”))
{
talk(“Head Co-Owner” +playerName+ " just logged in! ");
}
else if (playerRights == 2)
{
talk(“Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged in!”);
}
else if (playerRights == 1)
{
talk(“Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in!”);
}
else if (playerRights == 4)
{
talk(“Player " +playerName+ " has logged in!”);
}
else if (playerRights == 0)
{

talk(“Player " +playerName+ " has logged in!”);
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: "Has logged in" message
item.dc:creator: @naruto11230 naruto11230
item.description:
@naruto11230 wrote:

I was wondering, where i put this is the client.java

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("DemonicDusty")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "The Best Hoster, Owner, & Coder " +playerName+ " just logged in! "; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("DemonicDusty") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("DemonicDusty") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("DemonicDusty")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "The Best Hoster, Owner, & Coder " +playerName+ " just logged in!"; } else if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Co-Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in!"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("jrfighter3")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Head Co-Owner" +playerName+ " just logged in! "; } else if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged in!"; } else if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in!"; } else if (playerRights == 4) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Player " +playerName+ " has logged in!"; } else if (playerRights == 0) {

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Player " +playerName+ " has logged in!”;
}
}


i took it off one of my other sources and using it on my new one cause it doesnt have anything like this, so i was wondering where is goes, source im using now is ScapeScape
